com.adeptions.clarguments

Class ArgsParsingOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adeptions.clarguments.ArgsParsingOptions

  • public class ArgsParsingOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    The options to be used when parsing args

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArgsParsingOptions()
      Constructs an ArgsParsingOptions with default options Default options are: * spaced args * arg name prefix is "-" (@see com.adeptions.arguments.ArgsParsingOptions.DEFAULT_ARG_NAME_PREFIX)
      ArgsParsingOptions(java.lang.Character characterBetweenArgNameAndValue, java.lang.String argNamePrefix, java.lang.String argNameSuffix)
      Constructs an ArgsParsingOptions with the specified arg name/value separator, arg name prefix and suffix

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArgsParsingOptions

        public ArgsParsingOptions()
        Constructs an ArgsParsingOptions with default options Default options are: * spaced args * arg name prefix is "-" (@see com.adeptions.arguments.ArgsParsingOptions.DEFAULT_ARG_NAME_PREFIX)

      • ArgsParsingOptions

        public ArgsParsingOptions(java.lang.Character characterBetweenArgNameAndValue,
                          java.lang.String argNamePrefix,
                          java.lang.String argNameSuffix)
        Constructs an ArgsParsingOptions with the specified arg name/value separator, arg name prefix and suffix
        Parameters:
        characterBetweenArgNameAndValue - the character between the arg name and value (specify as null for spaced args)
        argNamePrefix - the expected prefix for arg names (or null if no prefix expected)
        argNameSuffix - the expected suffix for arg names (or null if no suffix expected)

    • Method Detail

      • isSpaceBetweenArgNameAndValue

        public boolean isSpaceBetweenArgNameAndValue()
        Gets whether spaced style args are to be parsed
        Returns:
        whether spaced style args are to be parsed

      • setSpaceBetweenArgNameAndValue

        public void setSpaceBetweenArgNameAndValue(boolean spaceBetweenArgNameAndValue)
        Sets whether spaced style args are to be parsed
        Parameters:
        spaceBetweenArgNameAndValue - whether spaced style args are to be parsed (when false and no character between yet specified then the character between is defaulted to ':')

      • getCharacterBetweenArgNameAndValue

        public java.lang.Character getCharacterBetweenArgNameAndValue()
        Gets the character expected between arg name and value
        Returns:
        the character expected between arg name and value (null for spaced style args)

      • setCharacterBetweenArgNameAndValue

        public void setCharacterBetweenArgNameAndValue(java.lang.Character characterBetweenArgNameAndValue)
        Sets the expected character between arg name and value
        Parameters:
        characterBetweenArgNameAndValue - the character between arg name and value (if null specified then spaced args style is assumed)

      • getArgNamePrefix

        Returns:
        the expected arg name prefix

      • setArgNamePrefix

        public void setArgNamePrefix(java.lang.String argNamePrefix)
        Sets the expected arg name prefix
        Parameters:
        argNamePrefix - the expected arg name prefix (or null if no prefix expected)

      • getArgNameSuffix

        public java.lang.String getArgNameSuffix()

        the expected arg name suffix

        Sets the expected arg name suffix
        Parameters:

      • getBadArgExceptionsHandler

        public BadArgExceptionsHandler getBadArgExceptionsHandler()
        Gets the args parsing exception handler
        Returns:
        the args parsing exception handler

      • setBadArgsExceptionHandler

        public void setBadArgsExceptionHandler(BadArgExceptionsHandler badArgExceptionsHandler)
        Sets the bad arg exception handler
        Parameters:
        badArgExceptionsHandler - the args parsing exception handler (if null is specified the default handler is used - which returns exceptions rather than throwing)
